title: Fragment (India), 14th–15th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: resist-printed on plain weave
description: Coarse undyed cotton plain cloth forms design against red ground.  At right, broad incomplete border of rosettes with octagons, dots, and geometric forms.  At left, plain red ground at top, double band of ogive forms and wavy-edged squares.  Ground design of whirling sun motif.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment (India), 14th–15th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: resist-printed on plain weave. 
1939-13-10
